mobs.long_desc: A small green flier flits away in a suspicious manner.
mobs.desc: This quietly scuttling little flier is made of what seems to be green leaves folded in a sphere, with ropes connecting it to a tiny basket of tiny green creatures armed with spears that hangs below it. While it's obviously a tool of reconnaissance, it seems like it would also make a formidable opponent.

mobs.long_desc: A waist-tall, grey-skinned, stinking Whatsit tries to flee from you.
mobs.desc: This pasty-skinned little creature is about the size of a large dog, and vaguely bipedal. It has strong-looking jaws in its hairless snout, and an emaciated body whose ribs stick out. It has no hair at all.

mobs.long_desc: A large creature that resembles an iguana forages for food.
mobs.desc: This is clearly not an iguana, unless it's a much bigger version of one. Perhaps this is where the little iguanas further south come from. This creature is green-scaled and four-limbed like its older cousin. It moves sluggishly, one leg at a time.

mobs.long_desc: A longhorn ram calmly walks across the mountain path.
mobs.desc: How did this ram get out of the high mountains? At any rate, it's here, walking around and looking in vain for something green to eat. Its fur is shaggy, a natural consequence of life in the high altitudes of the Syric Mountains.

mobs.long_desc: A cloaked ranger leans gently on his bow.
mobs.desc: A tall, slender elf leans gently on his bow.  He is clothed in a smoke-gray cloak to ward off the powerful sun, and slung over his muscled arm is a large water sack of sorts.  All of his garments are worn in such a way as to keep sand and loose stones from hitching a ride.  From under his dark cowl his gleaming eyes scan the horizon.

objects.ground: An elegant satin dress lies folded here.

extras.text: This dress is made of fine satin; it's the color of orchids, with gold braid accents and dark purple ribbon trim. The neckline seems a bit daring, but from the cut of the dress, you can tell that whoever wears this garment wouldn't be embarassed unduly by showing a bit of cleavage.

objects.short: a long, flowing white silk wedding gown
objects.ground: A long, flowing white silk gown has been neatly folded and left here.

extras.text: You've never seen such a magnificent gown! It's good enough for a princess or queen to wear to her nuptials, with a long, flowing skirt of white silk tulle, and a bodice of the same and covered in handmade laces from around the world. The leg-o-mutton sleeves end in triangles of soft white fabric that partially cover the backs of the bride's hands. Truly, it's a magnificent garment.

objects.short: a dashing black tuxedo with tails
objects.ground: A dashing black tuxedo lies here.

extras.text: What a dashing black suit this is! You just know that it would make any man's physique appear perfect, through the cunning cut and elegant flow of its dark silk fabric.

objects.short: a bridal bouquet of cream and gold colored roses
objects.ground: A bridal bouquet has been lost here!

extras.text: The bouquet is made up of what must be a hundred absolutely perfect roses. Most of them are cream colored, but there are a few golden ones thrown in to add artistic flavor. The bouquet is very large, going down to the bride's knees, but it's so light that she could carry it easily.

objects.ground: A beautiful orange flower grows wild on a bush here.

extras.text: This perfect orange flower's petals are soft as silk. It exudes a strange, exotic fragrance that allures you, making you feel stronger, and somehow more alert to any dangers around you.

objects.ground: A strange hood-like article lies on the ground, forgotten.

extras.text: Throwing you into a world of power and mystery, this hood has magic beyond the understanding of mortal men. Given by the gods, it is truly a gift of great value and it would be a poor idea to toss it aside. You have never seen an artifact quite like this.

objects.ground: A richly woven mantle lies crumpled in a heap here.

extras.text: This finely made mantle is made of dark green velvet, edged in thick ermine fur. The dark spots stand out against the white fur, and both are an excellent foil for the velvet, which is brocaded in gold.

objects.short: a toga made out of a flower-printed bedsheet
objects.ground: A bedsheet lies in a heap here. Get it quick!

extras.text: This sheet seems a little threadbare, which is probably why it isn't on somebody's bed. The little golden-and-green flowers that adorn it are sprightly, although they detract from the general image the wearer must be trying to project.

objects.short: the Gold Laurel Wreath of the Champion
objects.ground: A wreath made of gilded laurel branches rests here.

extras.text: This wreath is the mark of the true champion. It is given only by the hand of a God or Goddess, and only for true merit. If you have nobly won this wreath, wear it with pride. If you did not earn it, expect to lose it.

triggers.name: KoD_demisekeep_newbie_guard
triggers.commands: if %actor.vnum% == -1 if %actor.level% < 30 smile whisper %actor.name% I would not suggest going any further. wait 1 grin %actor.name% whisper %actor.name% It is fraught with danger above your abilities. elseif %actor.level% < 60 say I will let you pass, but still be careful beyond this point. emote points east. wait 5 mforce %actor% east else return 0 end endif

triggers.name: holy_burn_the_wicked
triggers.commands: if %actor.class% == Paladin if %actor.align% < 750 wait 2 oecho the holy blade of Godly vigor dulls in appearance. osend %actor% You are no longer holy enough to use this sacred weapon, you can no longer wield it. oechoaround %actor% %actor.name%'s blade grows dull, unglowing. oforce %actor% remove vigor elseif %actor.align% >= 750 wait 2 oecho the holy blade of Godly vigor glows with a soft, white light. osend %actor% Your eyes widen with awe and splendor as you hold the holy blade of Godly vigor. oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% is surrounded by a holy glow. endif elseif %actor.class% /= Paladin if %actor.align% < -350 wait 2 oecho the holy blade of Godly vigor glows violently! osend %actor% The pain in your body is excruciating, you feel death. eval var_dam = %random.50% + 1517 oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% convulses and life drains from his body. (&3%var_dam%&0) odamage %actor% %var_dam% * Note: this oforce will cause syserror if damage kills victim * oforce %actor% remove vigor elseif %actor.align% >= -350 wait 2 oecho the holy blade of Godly vigor vibrates unsteadily. osend %actor% This blade clearly is not happy to be in your hands.  Take care. oechoaround %actor% %actor.name%'s hands shake unsteadily as he holds the blade. oforce %actor% remove vigor endif endif

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: Rocks are freshly turned aside, as if someone just recently discovered that they blocked another trail that runs to the north a ways before sloping sharply upward.  The mountains crowd in to the north and south, preventing passage in those directions. A signpost stands here.  It looks important.

East.description: To the east, the trail continues.

West.description: To the west, another trail runs just past here.

extras.text: The sign reads: The Syric Mountain Pass is newly discovered. No one knows yet what lies beyond it. Travel here at your own risk! It is signed with a spiky runish word: "Sirestis".

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs east-west in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees that spring up nearby.  The path ends here entirely, taking up again further up, where it runs far to the north in a different gorge.

West.description: The trail continues far to the west.

Up.description: The trail slopes so sharply upward you must climb.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail continues to the north.

Down.description: The trail slopes downward very sharply here, almost in a cliff.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail runs far to the north before curving out of sight.

South.description: The trail ends to the south in a steep downward slope.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north before curving out of sight.

South.description: The trail continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail continues to the north a short ways before curving to the east.

South.description: The trail runs a ways to the south.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail curves gracefully out of view.

South.description: The trail runs far to the south.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

East.description: The trail curves out of view.

South.description: The trail runs for a long distance to the south.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north.

West.description: The trail runs out of view here.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north.

South.description: The trail runs a short distance to the south before curving out of sight.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north.

South.description: The trail runs a short distance to the south, before curving out of sight.

rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north.

South.description: The trail runs a wyas to the south before curving out of sight.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north before sloping sharply upward.

South.description: The trail runs through the gorge in the mountains to the south.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail slopes very sharply upward here.

South.description: The trail runs a ways to the south, through the mountains.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

South.description: The trail runs a ways to the south, through the mountains.

Up.description: The trail slopes upward so steeply you will have to climb to get further.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

rooms.name: A T-Intersection in the Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail continues far to the north, through the mountains.

South.description: The trail ends in an obsidian-lined path that begins to the south.

West.description: The trail slopes very sharply downward.

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Obsidian Path
rooms.description: Someone has taken a lot of time and money to create a paved pathway out of large panels of black, glass-like obsidian.  The path itself is lined with the material, and it has short obsidian walls on each side of it to keep brush and stray rocks from marring the utterly pristine beauty of the pathway.  The path cuts into a gorge between the blue-grey Syric Mountains and runs to the east, while to the north, another path, much more primitive, begins.

North.description: The path runs far to the north, through the mountains.

East.description: The obsidian path continues to the east.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Path
rooms.description: Someone has taken a lot of time and money to create a paved pathway out of large panels of black, glass-like obsidian.  The path itself is lined with the material, and it has short obsidian walls on each side of it to keep brush and stray rocks from marring the utterly pristine beauty of the pathway.  The path cuts into a gorge between the blue-grey Syric Mountains and runs to the east and west, curving out of sight before it runs very far in either direction. Tall, stark evergreen trees rise up on either side of the path.

East.description: The path continues to the east. Not far away, it curves out of view.

West.description: The path curves out of sight.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Obsidian Path
rooms.description: Someone has taken a lot of time and money to create a paved pathway out of large panels of black, glass-like obsidian.  The path itself is lined with the material, and it has short obsidian walls on each side of it to keep brush and stray rocks from marring the utterly pristine beauty of the pathway.  The path cuts into a gorge between the blue-grey Syric Mountains and runs to the west and south, curving out of sight before it runs very far in either direction. Tall, stark evergreen trees rise up on either side of the path.

South.description: The path continues to the south.

West.description: The path continues a bit to the west before curving out of sight.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Obsidian Path
rooms.description: Someone has taken a lot of time and money to create a paved pathway out of large panels of black, glass-like obsidian.  The path itself is lined with the material, and it has short obsidian walls on each side of it to keep brush and stray rocks from marring the utterly pristine beauty of the pathway.  The path cuts into a gorge between the blue-grey Syric Mountains and runs to the north and east, curving out of sight before it runs very far in either direction. Tall, stark evergreen trees rise up on either side of the path.

North.description: The path curves to the north.

East.description: The path continues to the east a ways.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Path
rooms.description: This path is made of hundreds of large panes of obsidian.  You have no idea where the builders got obsidian from -- it is not naturally found in this part of the world.  Perhaps whoever got it had connections in the southern islands...  The path runs to the east and west, curving out of sight rather quickly in both directions.

East.description: The path continues, curving out of sight to the east.

West.description: The path continues, curving out of sight to the west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Obsidian Path
rooms.description: This path is made of hundreds of large panes of obsidian.  The black, glass-like material also forms two thigh-high walls on either side of the pathway.  Stark, dark grey and brown trees rise up behind the short walls, their appearance almost threatening.

South.description: The trail continues a ways to the south.

West.description: The path continues to the west a short distance before curving out of sight.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Path
rooms.description: This path, constructed of panels of carefully quarried obsidian, leads through a gorge in the mountains to the north and south.  To the south, far in the distance, you see towers of some kind.  Trees form a very forbidding forest wall, preventing passage to the east and west.

North.description: The path curves up ahead to the north.

South.description: The path continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Obsidian Path
rooms.description: Someone has taken a great deal of care to construct this pathway. The black obsidian forming it is smooth as glass, except for the natural passage of time, which has made razor-sharp nicks in the surface that you must carefully avoid. The forests covering these grey mountains are composed of evergreens, mostly, which makes sense considering how cool it is up here.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

South.description: The path ends. A signpost stands right in the middle of the lane.

rooms.name: The End of the Obsidian Path
rooms.description: You have no idea who built this path, or where the obsidian panels forming it come from -- you know of nowhere within hundreds of leagues that the black glasslike rock comes from. It's expertly crafted, however. The trees rising on either side of the trail block vision to the east and west, but far to the south, in the distance, you see towers of some kind. A sign stands here on a wrought-iron post.

North.description: The path continues to the north a short distance.

extras.text: The post is sunk into the obsidian of the pathway. It rises to just above head-height. The sign is written in very stern block letters engraved into its iron surface. The sign reads: ------------------------------------------------------- /                                                      / /            ^                                         / /          /   \                                       / /           | |       The Syric Mountain Trail         / /           | |                                        / /                                                      / /           | |                                        / /           | |       Demise Keep                      / /          \   /                                       / /            `                                         / /                                                      / /       BEWARE: Demise Keep is not for the weak        / /    or the inexperienced! Travel at your own risk!    / /                                                      / ------------------------------------------------------ |                       | |                       | |                       | |                       | |                       | |                       |

rooms.name: The Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-south here.  Much further to the south, you see another trail intersect this one, and beyond that, a sparkling black trail.

North.description: The trail continues far to the north before curving out of sight.

South.description: The trail intersects a short ways to the south.

rooms.name: The Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-south here.  Much further to the south, you see another trail intersect this one, and beyond that, a sparkling black trail.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north.

South.description: The trail runs a ways to the south, intersecting other trails.

rooms.name: The Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-south here.  Much further to the south, you see another trail intersect this one, and beyond that, a sparkling black trail.

North.description: The trail curves out of sight just ahead.

South.description: The trail continues to the south for a long way.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs east-south here.

East.description: The path curves out of sight.

South.description: The trail continues far to the south.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-west here.

North.description: The trail continues through the mountains.

West.description: The trail curves out of sight to the west.

rooms.name: The Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-south here, curving sweetly to follow the gorge's natural bends.

North.description: The path continues to the north before curving out of sight.

South.description: The path continues before curving out of sight.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs east-south here.

East.description: The path continues before curving out of sight.

South.description: The path continues to the south for a short distance.

rooms.name: The Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-west here, sloping upward in an inexorable ascent.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

West.description: The path continues to the west before curving out of sight.

rooms.name: The Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-south here.

North.description: The path continues to the north a ways.

South.description: The path continues to the south before bending out of sight.

rooms.name: The Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail runs north-south here.

North.description: The path continues to the north, through the mountains.

South.description: The path continues a short distance to the south before it curves out of sight.

rooms.name: The End of the Northern Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: The forest all around you is breathtaking in its beauty and grimness.  A roughly-beaten trail closely follows a narrow gorge between two mountaintops. The air is noticably cooler up here, and much mistier than you'd have expected. The trail continues to the south, while, to the north, a plateau covered in evergreens begins.

North.description: A mountain forest on a plateau begins to the north.

South.description: The path continues to the south.

rooms.name: A Mountain Plateau
rooms.description: This plateau, covered in trees, is shrouded in grey mist that winds through the forest that stretches to the north and west.  The trail ends, becoming more of a footpath, if even that, that leads to the north.

North.description: The plateau continues, with forest all around.

South.description: A path through the mountains begins to the south and runs far to the distance.

rooms.name: A Mountain Plateau
rooms.description: This plateau, covered in trees, is shrouded in grey mist that winds through the forest that stretches to the north and west.  The trail ends, becoming more of a footpath, if even that, that leads to the north.

North.description: A primitive footpath begins to the north.

South.description: The plateau continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north before curving out of sight.

South.description: The trail continues to the south.

South.description: The trail continues to the south.

South.description: The trail continues to the south.

South.description: The trail continues to the south.

South.description: The trail continues to the south.

rooms.description: A narrow, rock-strewn path runs north-south in the natural gorge of a mountain range.  The mountains themselves tower above your head to the east and west, making the path seem like a narrow ribbon fringed by thick green trees.

North.description: The trail runs a ways to the north before curving out of sight.

South.description: The trail continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow path, more a crack between two jutting mountain peaks, marks this part of the trail.  Pebbles fall from the sides of the gorge with little noises with almost every step you take.

East.description: To the east, the trail continues.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow path, more a crack between two jutting mountain peaks, marks this part of the trail.  Pebbles fall from the sides of the gorge with little noises with almost every step you take.

East.description: To the east, the trail continues.

West.description: The trail continues to the west.

rooms.description: A narrow path, more a crack between two jutting mountain peaks, marks this part of the trail.  Pebbles fall from the sides of the gorge with little noises with almost every step you take.

East.description: To the east, the trail continues.

East.description: To the east, the trail continues.

East.description: To the east, the trail continues.

East.description: To the east, the trail continues.

rooms.name: The Syric Mountain Trail
rooms.description: A narrow path, more a crack between two jutting mountain peaks, marks this part of the trail.  Pebbles fall from the sides of the gorge with little noises with almost every step you take.

East.description: The trail continues to the east, sloping upward sharply.

West.description: The trail continues to the south.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: You can tightly squeeze through the surrounding rock.  This place is desolate and dry and it seems to grow colder.  A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, just loose rock between the walls of the mountainside.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: You can tightly squeeze through the surrounding rock.  This place is desolate and dry and it seems to grow colder.  A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, just loose rock between the walls of the mountainside.

A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, just loose rock between the walls of the mountainside.

A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, just loose rock between the walls of the mountainside.

rooms.name: Black Rock Path
rooms.description: You can tightly squeeze through the surrounding rock.  This place is desolate and dry and it seems to grow colder.  A fierce wind blows all about you almost pinning you against the rocks around you.  The path is difficult to determine, just loose rock between the walls of the mountainside.

rooms.name: The End of the Black Rock Path
rooms.description: To the far north, you can see a huge mountain rising, wreathed in mists. This little path, just a crack between mountain walls, widens slightly, leading upward toward the largest mountain in the chain.

East.description: You can see the beginning of the Syric Mountain Trail to the east.
